trends: There have been no other sightings in Armadale
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Star hovering at high altitude, tracking the fixed and backwards forwards. Intelligent thought provoking. Myself and brother witnessed for 4hours
divs: Sighting DetailsMyself and my brother were in my shed making electronic music on a Friday night. Clear skies perfect weather. Approx 1am my brother called to me begging me to come check out this ufo. I was fixated on the music I was working on and didn't pay much attention. He soon gave up and rejoined me. Approx an hour and a half later I went outside to urinate. I looked up to see this orb tracking backwards and forwards and sort of floating and sometimes making decisive sharp monuvers. My brother and I watch this for hours till sun came up. It made us both feel very unusual. We have had many sightings but have seen nothing for quite sometime now
